Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.22.2
Entries.Description: Do you want to see the app in your language? Help me with translations! some languages are partially done but require volunteers - apply on the website or send me an email to start.
Messages: Fix measurements not ordered by date in exported JSON file.
Fix collecting not stopped on low battery on Oreo and newer.
Add 'ocid' suffix to exported CSV file name when using OpenCellID.org formatting.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.22.0
Entries.Description: Do you want to see the app in your language? Help me with translations! some languages are partially done but require volunteers - apply on the website or send me an email to start.
Messages: Add option to stop collector when battery is getting low.
Add collecting measurements when at least one of main cell changes even without move.
Remove option to hide Collector notification on Oreo and newer because Android automatically increases channel importance to DEFAULT level for foreground services. See more.
Fix exception when logging to file.
Updated translations and new language - Ukrainian.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.21.0
Entries.Description: Do you want to see the app in your language? Help me with translations! Catalan, Dutch, French, Hungarian, Spanish, Swedish are partially done but require volunteers - apply on the website or send me an email to start.
Messages: Fix export to MLS JSON creating invalid files.
Fix runtime permissions not checked before import and export of database or preferences.
Add PSC value to exported GPX file.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.20.0
Entries.Description: Tower Collector is now available in official F-Droid repository! Special thanks to takiainen, est31 and IzzySoft for help :)
Messages: Fix wrong order of labels for Export dialog for Portuguese and Russian languages.
Fix invalid API key recognized as connection error during upload.
Improve code compatibility with F-Droid repository rules.
Add option to import/export internal preferences and database (use on your own risk!).
